name: 2nd Global Summit on Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology
content: Dear Colleagues, It is a great pleasure to announce that The Scientistt will host the 2nd Global Summit on Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology (TOXI2022) will be held September 19-21, 2022 in Barcelona, Spain. TOXI2022 aims to bring together the renowned researchers, scientists and scholars to exchange ideas, to present sophisticated research works and to discuss hot topics in the field and share their experiences on all aspects of Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology. The TOXI2022 will be a 3 days event that means to gather the key players of the Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology community and related sectors. This event is launched with the aims to become an established event, attracting global participants, intent on sharing, exchanging and exploring new avenues of Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology-related scientific and commercial developments. A wide-ranging scientific program consisting of plenary lectures, keynote lectures, Invited lectures, parallel sessions, as well as poster sessions for young scientists covering all topics in Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology will be scheduled. This conference provides a wonderful opportunity for you to enhance your knowledge about the newest interdisciplinary approaches in Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology. Moreover, the conference offers a valuable platform to create new contacts in the field of Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology, by providing valuable networking time for you to meet great personnel in the field. We look forward to seeing you at TOXI2022 in Barcelona, Spain.
